According to biblical predictions 80% of Earth's population will die in the 
war, so hoping for the best won't do much.  But the Anti-Christ is supposed 
to come from ten united Middle Eastern countries and there is supposed to be 
great conflict in the Middle East, including Israel and Russian forces.  
America is not a factor, either because it's isolationist, broken up, to weak 
to do anything, or the prophecies were interpruted wrong.
